chapters.title: Chapter 14: Wet Things
chapters.info: Jillari, p. 324—Seanchan damane captured by the Asha'man, now in Caemlyn. She, like many other damane, is convinced that she needs to be collared, to protect others. She appears to be in her middle years; even she does not know her true age. She is slight of build and has long fiery red hair and green eyes.
